name: mikroe.click.uva
short_description: UVA Click is a compact add-on board used to detect solar UV index. This board features the GUVA-C32SM, an ultraviolet light sensor capable of measuring UV index between 0 to 14 from Genicom Co., Ltd. It contains the GaN-based chip die, amplifiers, ADC, digital control logic, and I2C interface circuit to measure UVA volumes, working in the spectral range of 220-370nm. The GUVA-C32M can acquire the intensity of UVA, respectively, and outputs digital count according to each intensity.
